meanings.definition: To assign a new or different value or meaning to something.
meanings.sent1: She is transvaluing the old furniture to make it look new.
meanings.sent2: The artist is transvaluing traditional art techniques to create modern masterpieces.
meanings.sent3: By transvaluing the recipe, she turned a simple dish into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: His unique perspective on life allows him to transvalue challenges into opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Transvaluing the outdated policies breathed new life into the organization.

meanings.definition: The act of reevaluating or reassessing the worth or significance of something.
meanings.sent1: The transvaluing of the antique vase revealed its true historical value.
meanings.sent2: After careful transvaluing, the team decided to invest in the project.
meanings.sent3: The sudden transvaluing of the stock market left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent4: Her transvaluing of her priorities led to a happier and more fulfilling life.
meanings.sent5: The transvaluing of the old building uncovered hidden architectural gems.
